response.original_title: NOSFERATU WITH INVINCIBLE CZAR'S LIVE SCORE
response.overview: F.W. Murnau’s 1922 classic, Nosferatu, featuring an original live score combining rock and orchestral music, created and performed by the highly-acclaimed Austin music ensemble, The Invincible Czars! Nosferatu has been the Invincible Czars’ most popular silent film score since it debuted in 2015, and this unique show is ear and eye candy for fans of horror movies from all eras!
response.title: NOSFERATU WITH INVINCIBLE CZAR'S LIVE SCORE
